class.name: Marshalls
class.description: Provides data transformation and encoding utility functions.

method.name: base64_to_raw
method.description: Returns a decoded [PackedByteArray] corresponding to the Base64-encoded string [param base64_str].

method.name: base64_to_utf8
method.description: Returns a decoded string corresponding to the Base64-encoded string [param base64_str].

method.name: base64_to_variant
method.description: Returns a decoded [Variant] corresponding to the Base64-encoded string [param base64_str]. If [param allow_objects] is [code]true[/code], decoding objects is allowed. Internally, this uses the same decoding mechanism as the [method @GlobalScope.bytes_to_var] method. [b]Warning:[/b] Deserialized objects can contain code which gets executed. Do not use this option if the serialized object comes from untrusted sources to avoid potential security threats such as remote code execution.

method.name: raw_to_base64
method.description: Returns a Base64-encoded string of a given [PackedByteArray].

method.name: utf8_to_base64
method.description: Returns a Base64-encoded string of the UTF-8 string [param utf8_str].

method.name: variant_to_base64
method.description: Returns a Base64-encoded string of the [Variant] [param variant]. If [param full_objects] is [code]true[/code], encoding objects is allowed (and can potentially include code). Internally, this uses the same encoding mechanism as the [method @GlobalScope.var_to_bytes] method.
